about_the_game:
The lands of Ascrabeth are under threat and an alliance of the willing is gathering. You are responsible for providing your followers with everything they need to succeed! From crafting weapons to farming crops, you will do whatever is necessary to equip them with the finest gear, the tastiest provisions, and the most comfortable accommodations.

Craft, Farm and Build

Improve your skills in gathering resources and crafting a wide range of hero-equipment. Cultivate a variety of crops to create delicious provisions and build up comfortable houses to furnish them cozily.

Lead your Heroes to Success

Equip your heroes, plan their missions, and assemble the most powerful teams for each adventure. Fulfill their individual needs to boost their morale and help them grow into the ultimate defenders of Ascrabeth.

Establish a Flourishing Village

Grow the Fellowship of the Oak from a lone tavern into a thriving village where your heroes feel truly at home! As your fellowship grows, use workers to automate tasks in order to help you provide the best care for all of your residents.

Join the Fellowship

Fellowship of the Oak is developed by a small team of two developers. We are open to feedback and welcome everyone who wishes to contribute ideas, suggestions and criticism :)

name: Fellowship of the Oak

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or later (64-Bit)
  • Processor: i5-3570 3.4 GHz 4 Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1650/GTX 1050-ti, or AMD RX 470/RX 570, or equivalent performance & VRAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Fellowship of the Oak is a cozy crafting sim where you gather a fellowship of heroes, providing them with everything they need to succeed on their adventures. Build cozy homes, craft gear, farm provisions and manage expeditions in order to collect powerful loot!
supported_languages:
English*, German
*languages with full audio support
